thread.title: Nexonia to Sponsor Microsoft Dynamics GP User Group Summit
thread.title_full: Nexonia to Sponsor Microsoft Dynamics GP User Group Summit - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Nexonia to Sponsor Microsoft Dynamics GP User Group Summit
text:
CEO Neil Wainwright will present a session on Nexonia’s Microsoft Dynamics® GP solution.
(PRWEB) September 23, 2015
Nexonia Inc, leading provider of web and mobile business financial management solutions, today announced their gold sponsor-level participation at GPUG Summit, a Microsoft Dynamics® GP user training conference. GPUG Summit offers Dynamics GP users the unique opportunity to engage with fellow users in an educational environment that includes well-rounded session topics and access to peer-to-peer networking. This year’s annual event will be held October 13-16 in Reno-Tahoe, Nevada.
“The session I hosted at the 2014 conference, Expense Reports Completely Integrated with Dynamics GP, was a huge hit with GPUG attendees,” said Neil Wainwright, CEO of Nexonia. “This year, we’re eager to contribute to the success of this community and delight Dynamics GP users with all of the work we’ve put into our integration.”
“We are excited to welcome Nexonia as gold sponsor at this year’s GPUG Summit event,” said Janet Lampert, Dynamic Communities Inc. President and COO. “Not only will this year’s event be historical in attendance, Nexonia’s involvement and shared expertise will enhance the overall experience of attendees.”
Hosted by the Microsoft Dynamics® GP user group (GPUG) GPUG Summit 2015 will offer attendees over 200 sessions spread among more than 15 learning tracks. Session titles and descriptions, which were submitted by community members and reviewed by the GPUG Summit Planning Committee, are available online for review.
This year’s theme, Go All IN, encourages attendees to get involved with the event by participating as a speaker, volunteer, or engagement in onsite activities such as Pre-Conference training, hosted by GPUG Academy. Pre-Conference training features classroom training by instructors, and most classes offer CPE credits. Training session will cover topics including Business Intelligence, IT, and Manufacturing.
Nexonia’s CEO, Neil Wainwright, will be presenting Ditch the Receipts: Easy Expense Management for Dynamics GP on Friday, October 16 at 9:30am (PDT) in the Emerald C room at the Reno Atlantis Hotel (2nd floor).
About GPUG Summit: GPUG Summit will be held October 13-16 in Reno-Tahoe, Nevada. GPUG Summit has established itself as the premier training opportunity for Microsoft Dynamics® GP users and partners. This annual event offers attendees breakout sessions, keynote presentations, and unprecedented in-person networking opportunities. For more information, visit http://www.gpugsummit.com , OR contact Whitney Derks, Dynamic Communities Inc. Event Marketing Manager: whitney(at)dynamiccommunities(dot)com.
About Nexonia:
Nexonia Inc. is a provider of leading web and mobile expense, time and other business financial management solutions, including: Nexonia Expenses, Nexonia Timesheets, Nexonia Time Off, Nexonia Time Allocation, Nexonia Purchase Orders and Nexonia Accounts Payable. Nexonia’s simple-to-use and highly customizable applications are fully integrated with ERPs, credit cards and other systems supporting a variety of businesses. Nexonia solutions are designed to streamline the reporting and approval process, improve human resource management and enhance operational efficiency.
To receive more information, visit http://www.nexonia.com or call 800-291-4829.
